# SuperLink ISO MIni镜像
## 1.准备mkisofs和rufus工具

### mkisofs

```bash
[root@localhost superlink]# mkisofs --version
mkisofs 2.01 is not what you see here. This line is only a fake for too clever
GUIs and other frontend applications. In fact, this program is:
genisoimage 1.1.11 (Linux)
```

### [Rufus](https://rufus.ie/zh/)

![图片](data:image/png;base64,)


![图片](data:image/png;base64,)



---

## 2.挂载SuperLink镜像

```bash
 mkdir /root/superlink
 mount /root/SuperLink.iso /mnt/
 cp -a /mnt/* /root/superlink/
```

## 3.创建kickstart文件

```bash
vim /root/superlink/isolinux/ks.cfg
```

```cfg
#version=DEVEL
# System authorization information
auth --enableshadow --passalgo=sha512
reboot
# Use CDROM installation media
cdrom
# Use graphical install
#graphical
# Use text install
text
# Run the Setup Agent on first boot
firstboot --enable
ignoredisk --only-use=sda
# Keyboard layouts
keyboard --vckeymap=us --xlayouts='us'
# System language
lang en_US.UTF-8

# Network information
network  --bootproto=dhcp --device=link --onboot=yes --ipv6=auto --no-activate
network  --hostname=localhost.localdomain

# SELinux configuration
selinux --disabled
# Root password
rootpw --iscrypted $1$nA9cIjlE$zGs.ZNT8T2rpDWppzfJ2i0
# System services
services --enabled="chronyd"
# System timezone
timezone Asia/Shanghai --isUtc

%include /tmp/partition.ks

%packages
@^minimal
@core
chrony
kexec-tools
%end

%addon com_redhat_kdump --enable --reserve-mb='auto'

%end

%anaconda
pwpolicy root --minlen=6 --minquality=1 --notstrict --nochanges --notempty
pwpolicy user --minlen=6 --minquality=1 --notstrict --nochanges --emptyok
pwpolicy luks --minlen=6 --minquality=1 --notstrict --nochanges --notempty
%end

%pre
#!/bin/sh
DISK_SIZE=$(lsblk -dn -o NAME,SIZE,TYPE,RM |grep -v -w 1 |grep disk|grep G |awk '{print$2}' |sort |uniq -u)
if [[ $(echo $DISK_SIZE|wc -w) == 1 ]];then
    ROOT_DISK=$(lsblk -dn -o NAME,SIZE |egrep -w $DISK_SIZE|awk '{print$1}')
else
    ROOT_DISK_2=$(lsblk -dn -o NAME,SIZE,TYPE,RM |grep -v -w 1 |grep disk|grep G|sort |head -n1|awk '{print$1}')
    if [[ -n $ROOT_DISK_2 ]];then
        ROOT_DISK=$ROOT_DISK_2
    else
        ROOT_DISK='sda'
    fi
fi
#系统分区
echo "reqpart" > /tmp/partition.ks
echo "ignoredisk --only-use=$ROOT_DISK" >> /tmp/partition.ks
echo "bootloader --location=mbr --boot-drive=$ROOT_DISK" >> /tmp/partition.ks
echo "clearpart --all --initlabel --drives=$ROOT_DISK" >> /tmp/partition.ks
echo "part swap --fstype=swap --size=2048 --ondisk=$ROOT_DISK" >> /tmp/partition.ks
echo "part /boot --fstype=xfs --size=1024 --ondisk=$ROOT_DISK " >> /tmp/partition.ks
echo "part / --asprimary --fstype=xfs --grow --size=1 --ondisk=$ROOT_DISK" >> /tmp/partition.ks
%end

```


```bash
chmod +x /root/superlink/isolinux/ks.cfg
```

## 4.修改isolinux.cfg文件

```cfg
default vesamenu.c32
timeout 120

display boot.msg

# Clear the screen when exiting the menu, instead of leaving the menu displayed.
# For vesamenu, this means the graphical background is still displayed without
# the menu itself for as long as the screen remains in graphics mode.
menu clear
menu background splash.png
menu title SuperLink
menu vshift 8
menu rows 18
menu margin 8
#menu hidden
menu helpmsgrow 15
menu tabmsgrow 13

# Border Area
menu color border * #00000000 #00000000 none

# Selected item
menu color sel 0 #ffffffff #00000000 none

# Title bar
menu color title 0 #ff7ba3d0 #00000000 none

# Press [Tab] message
menu color tabmsg 0 #ff3a6496 #00000000 none

# Unselected menu item
menu color unsel 0 #84b8ffff #00000000 none

# Selected hotkey
menu color hotsel 0 #84b8ffff #00000000 none

# Unselected hotkey
menu color hotkey 0 #ffffffff #00000000 none

# Help text
menu color help 0 #ffffffff #00000000 none

# A scrollbar of some type? Not sure.
menu color scrollbar 0 #ffffffff #ff355594 none

# Timeout msg
menu color timeout 0 #ffffffff #00000000 none
menu color timeout_msg 0 #ffffffff #00000000 none

# Command prompt text
menu color cmdmark 0 #84b8ffff #00000000 none
menu color cmdline 0 #ffffffff #00000000 none

# Do not display the actual menu unless the user presses a key. All that is displayed is a timeout message.

menu tabmsg Press Tab for full configuration options on menu items.

menu separator # insert an empty line
menu separator # insert an empty line

label linux
  menu label ^Install SuperLink Server
  menu default
  kernel vmlinuz
  append initrd=initrd.img  inst.stage2=hd:LABEL=superlink  inst.ks=hd:LABEL=superlink:/isolinux/ks.cfg quiet

menu separator # insert an empty line

label linux
  menu label Kickstart Unattended PXE
  kernel vmlinuz
  append initrd=initrd.img  inst.stage2=hd:LABEL=superlink  inst.ks=hd:LABEL=superlink:/isolinux/ks.cfg quiet

menu separator # insert an empty line

menu end

```

## 5.修改boot.msg文件[可选]

添加字符画

![图片](data:image/png;base64,)



---

## 6.添加额外的RPM软件包

RPM软件包及其各种依赖包放置在/root/superlink/Packages/目录下
::: tip eg
如若在安装时报错在Software selection时,则按ALT+F2 进入TTY2。查看packaging.log日志
:::
```bash
tail -f /tmp/packaging.log
#requires [rpm] 中的rpm则表示缺失的rpm软件包,此时需要根据日志内容对Packages内的rpm包进行补充。
``` 

修改repodata目录中的*-minimal-x86_64-comps.xml

```xml
方式一丶可在core核心组<id>core</id>直接添加
<packagereq type="mandatory">vim-enhanced</packagereq>

方式二丶创建单独的<group>组进行添加
 <group>
   <id>vim</id>
   <name>vim</name>
   <name xml:lang="zh_CN">核心</name>
   <description xml:lang="zh_CN">最小可能安装。</description>
   <default>false</default>
   <uservisible>false</uservisible>
   <packagelist>
   <packagereq type="mandatory">vim-enhanced</packagereq>
   </packagelist>
   </group>

mandatory #必须安装
default   #默认安装
optional  #可选安装
#可根据不同是需求来进行选择
```

在/root/superlink/目录下进行元数据更新

```bash
createrepo -g repodata/*-minimal-x86_64-comps.xml . --update
```

## 7.生成新SuperLink.iso镜像

```bash
mkisofs -R -J -T -v -no-emul-boot -boot-load-size 4 -boot-info-table -V superlink -b isolinux/isolinux.bin -c isolinux/boot.cat -o SuperLink.iso superlink/
```
SuperLink.iso #重新生成的镜像名
superlink/ #需要生成镜像的镜像目录
